entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:56 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 03:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
